This slur prefixes mother fucker (thayoli) with a casteist slur 'para'.  Here, 'para' (short for parayan) is used to insult someone as belonging to the oppressed caste community 'parayar'. Historically, in Tamil Nadu and neighbouring regions, the parayar community was associated with using/making the parai instrument (a type of drum made from cow hide and used for making announcements in a local community/village). However, it is used as an insult rather than as a reference to the work/art of plaing the parai.
